author: MSNBC
title: Sally Kellerman, ‘Hot Lips’ Houlihan in ‘M*A*S*H’ movie, dies at 84
description: Sally Kellerman, who was Oscar nominated for her supporting role as Margaret “Hot Lips” Houlihan in Robert Altman’s “M*A*S*H” feature film, died Thursday in Woo
content:
Sally Kellerman, who was Oscar nominated for her supporting role as Margaret Hot Lips Houlihan in Robert Altmans M*A*S*H feature film, died Thursday in Woodland Hills, Calif. She was 84.
